title: TRIVIUM Streams "The Deceived" Live From Manchester
description: From the ill-fated Poisoned Ascendancy tour. The post TRIVIUM Streams "The Deceived" Live From Manchester appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: From the ill-fated Poisoned Ascendancy tour.
text: Experience Trivium's crushing live performance of "The Deceived" filmed during their January 30, 2025 stop in Manchester, England as part of The Poisoned Ascendancy Tour. Captured with multi-camera intensity and professionally mixed, this footage delivers the band's signature blend of aggression and precision straight to your screen. Trivium's The Poisoned Ascendancy plans with Bullet For My Valentine might've been cut short, but that's not stopping them from kicking up their own trek! Trivium has just announced a North American tour for later this year (pretty much the entirety of Q3) with Jinjer and Heriot as support. Get your tickets here. "We couldn't be more excited to finally bring this monstrous tour to life — Trivium headlining this fall across North America with the unstoppable force of Jinjer and the crushing energy of Heriot," said Trivium frontman Matt Heafy. "Every night is going to be an absolute onslaught of riffs, sweat, and connection with our fans. This lineup represents the present and future of heavy music, and we're honored to share the stage with such ferocious talent. See you in the pit." 10/31 Myrtle Beach, SC House of Blues11/1 VA Beach, VA The Dome11/2 Montclair, NJ The Wellmont Theater11/4 London, ON Centennial Hall11/6 Québec, QC Videotron Centre11/7 Wallingford, CT Toyota Oakdale Theatre11/8 Portland, ME Cross Insurance Arena11/10 Warren, OH Packard Music Hall11/11 Buffalo, NY Buffalo River Works11/12 Lancaster, PA Freedom Hall11/14 Gary, IN Hard Rock Live Northern Indiana11/15 Milwaukee, WI The Eagles Ballroom11/16 Cincinnati, OH The Andrew J Brady Music Center11/18 Indianapolis, IN The Egyptian Room at Old National Centre11/19 Waukee, IA Vibrant Music Hall11/20 Minneapolis, MN Uptown Theater11/22 Winnipeg, MB Burton Cummings Theatre11/24 Edmonton, AB Midway Music Hall11/25 Calgary, AB Grey Eagle Events Centre11/26 Missoula, MT The Wilma11/28 Spokane, WA The Podium11/29 Garden City, ID Revolution Concert House12/1 Salt Lake City, UT The Union Event Center12/3 Riverside, CA Riverside Municipal Auditorium12/5 Albuquerque, NM Revel12/6 Oklahoma City, OK The Criterion12/7 Fayetteville, AR JJ's Live12/9 Springfield, MO Shrine Mosque12/10 Kansas City, MO Uptown Theater12/12 New Orleans, LA The Fillmore New Orleans12/13 Dothan, AL The Plant12/14 Orlando, FL Hard Rock Live Want More Metal? html:
Experience Trivium's crushing live performance of "The Deceived" filmed during their January 30, 2025 stop in Manchester, England as part of The Poisoned Ascendancy Tour. Captured with multi-camera intensity and professionally mixed, this footage delivers the band's signature blend of aggression and precision straight to your screen.

Trivium's The Poisoned Ascendancy plans with Bullet For My Valentine might've been cut short, but that's not stopping them from kicking up their own trek! Trivium has just announced a North American tour for later this year (pretty much the entirety of Q3) with Jinjer and Heriot as support. Get your tickets here.

"We couldn't be more excited to finally bring this monstrous tour to life — Trivium headlining this fall across North America with the unstoppable force of Jinjer and the crushing energy of Heriot," said Trivium frontman Matt Heafy.

"Every night is going to be an absolute onslaught of riffs, sweat, and connection with our fans. This lineup represents the present and future of heavy music, and we're honored to share the stage with such ferocious talent. See you in the pit."
